page.title: 07Pets: My Canary
page.content: {My canary} is now yellow after being a sandy colour at birth. He is about 14cm in length. His beak is a brown colour. He is kept in a cage in the front room by the window. We never let him out becuase he will not go back in the cage. At night I cover his cage with a big tea towel. In the morning I uncover the cage. As soon as I open the curtains he chirps. He will eat bird grit and a mixture of seeds. Sometimes we treat him to a honey bell which he likes a lot. A honey bell is is a bell made from honey and a variety of seeds. I clean him out twice a week three times if necessary. When I clean him out I am careful not to let him escape.
